generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings and tram tracks, which is the primary surface for vehicle movement.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the left side of the road, adjacent to parked cars and trees, with pedestrians walking on it.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings with windows and architectural details are visible along the street, forming the background.
- vegetation: Trees and hedges are present along the sidewalk and road, providing shade and greenery.
- sky: The sky is visible through the tree canopy in the upper right portion of the image.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the road.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a gray hatchback in front of the camera and a yellow van to the right.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is partially visible on the far left edge of the image.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the sidewalk on the left side of the road, being ridden by a person.
- traffic sign: A circular traffic sign (possibly a "no entry" or "priority" sign) is visible on a pole in the middle distance.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic signs and streetlights.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the far right side of the image, mounted on a pole.
